Hugh Farey :
 Unfortunately the Sovereign Order of St John of Jerusalem, of which De Simone is a Dame, is not part of, or affiliated to, the Alliance of the Orders of St John of Jerusalem, but was founded wholly independently by Charles Pichel in 1956. It has no relation whatever to the Knights of Malta past or present.
